Name: Savann
description: Savann is a 42-year-old married rice farmer with a child who is a factory worker. She lives in the Kampong Speu province of Cambodia. Her husband is a 43-year-old painter. Savann has been a rice farmer since 1982. Together, she and her husband can earn around $39 per day. Now Savann would like a loan to buy materials for drawings. This loan can help her and her family have enough money to buy more materials for drawing. In the future, she wants to build a fence around her house.
